main event: A merchant vessel sighted a low-flying, bright object described as resembling a satellite over Wilson Cove, San Clemente Island.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on June 2, 1961 at approximately 2211 hours., The object was reported to be traveling very low and very bright., The witness described the object as moving from east to west., The report was part of a communication to multiple military and intelligence agencies., The UFO was observed with clear weather conditions.
